{{Description|Judgment is such a tedious ordeal &mdash; much easier to skip that phase and get straight to the last rites. Rosaria was never very devoted to the [[Barbatos|Anemo God]] anyway, which makes performing them all too easy.}}
'''Rites of Termination''' is [[Rosaria]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|icd|All DMG dealt by this skill|0|plural=1}}
* The Ice Lance hits once every 2 seconds, so it hits a total of 4 times. With her Constellation Level 2, [[Land Without Promise]], the  Ice Lance hits a total of 6 times.
* {{TalentNote|ascension|2|Shadow Samaritan|increases the [[CRIT Rate]] of nearby party members (except Rosaria herself) by 15% of Rosaria's CRIT Rate for 10s after casting Rites of Termination.|character=Rosaria|talent=Rites of Termination}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|2|Land Without Promise}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|5|Last Rites}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Divine Retribution}}
